roleset.name: lend aid, credence to
roleset.note: UPHOLD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'uphold' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and comparison with 'support'. No verbnet entry. (from uphold.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But state courts upheld a challenge by consumer groups to the commission's rate increase and found the rates illegal.
example.arg: a challenge by consumer groups to the commission's rate increase
